title: Stomachache
content:
Stomachache
[肚子疼]
On Sunday, I got up around noon again, just like yesterday.
[周日，像昨天一样睡到大中午才起来。]
While washing up, I felt a dull pain in my stomach and immediately thought of the culprit—the ginger duck I had last night.
[洗漱的时候就感觉肚子隐隐作痛，一下子就联想到了罪魁祸首——昨晚吃的仔姜鸭。]
Ginger duck has been my favorite dish since I came to Chengdu, but it’s still too spicy for my stomach.
[仔姜鸭是我来到成都后最喜欢的一道菜，但是它对于我的肠胃来说还是太辣了。]
Sometimes I’m fine after eating it, but other times—like today—it messes up my stomach.
[有时吃没啥事，有时却会像今天一样闹肚子。]
Every time this happens, I swear I won’t eat it again, but I always give in to temptation.
[每次闹肚子时候都会决心说下次不吃了，但是还是嘴馋。]
This time, I need to set a reasonable rule: no more than once a week, and preferably on a non-working day.
[这次需要设定一个合理的要求，即一周最多吃一次，最好是非工作日吃。]
